categories: Category:Journey to Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker

nodes.text: Journey to Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker

Journey to Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker is a multimedia project that lead up to the release of Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. Several of the books take place during the same time frame as the publishing campaign for Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which was developed alongside this one. The books include hints and Easter eggs for the film prior to its release, as well as tell stories set between the events of Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi and Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker.
